name: Toto Temple Deluxe
description: Toto Temple Deluxe is a fast-paced, local-multiplayer king-of-the-hill style game in which players must steal an egg-laying goat from their friends and try to keep it on their own head for as long as possible. You know, normal stuff.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Had a LONG night of playing this yesterday with my mates; if you love a good competitive local MP, this is spot on, controls feel good, it's frantic but controllable, a bit like the frantic nature of towerfall, which we also love. Honestly can't fault it, and the humor is weird enough for us as well :) 10/10!
Got this product for free . and it's a very basic game . Good for playing with friends :)
